1.text: Place all of your pieces onto the corresponding color pocket.

2.text: Decide who goes first by rolling the die.

3.text: Roll a 6 to bring your first pawn onto the board.

4.text: Roll again to determine how many spaces to move your first pawn.

5.text: End your turn and pass the die to the next player after you move a pawn.

6.text: Place another pawn on the board if you roll another 6.

7.text: Continue to roll at the beginning of each turn and move your pawns.

8.text: Capture an opponent’s pawn by landing on the same space.

9.text: Get more than 1 of your pieces on the same space to make a block.

10.text: Land on the same space as an opponent’s pawn to move past it.

11.text: Move your pawns around the board going towards your home stretch.

12.text: Avoid spaces with special markings on them.

13.text: Roll the exact number needed to get each pawn onto the home base.

14.text: Reach the home space with all 4 of your pawns first to win the game.
